attributes.action: actually invest some of the billions in profit you receive from road and fuel duty tax to invest in infrastructure!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
actually invest some of the billions in profit you receive from road and fuel duty tax to invest in infrastructure!

Build more roads, make public transport easy and cheap to use, start using the money you get for transport and not other things all the time.
